mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT us.uid,us.uname,cs.courses_name,b.batch_name FROM users us INNER JOIN users_teach_courses ut ON us.uid=ut.uid INNER JOIN users_batch ub ON us.uid = ub.uid INNER JOIN batch b ON ub.batch_id = b.batch_id INNER JOIN courses cs ON ut.courses_id=cs.courses_id WHERE b.batch_name = #{batch_name} AND us.colleges_id = (SELECT colleges_id FROM users WHERE uid=#{uid}) AND us.uid!=#{uid} ORDER BY us.uid
